name: ReKandle
description:
Protect the enchanted forest by the threat of the Machines that are trying to put out the candle fire of the forest. You play as a magic guardian of the woods, cannon machines are trying to invade it, get rid of them!

Defend the fire core, collect mana, place walls to shield yourself and run.  Use the leaf for more protection. Swing and push the bombs to make the towers explode, light them up with the candle on your back. BOOM!

Power ups such as health, shield and speed are available to help you in your journey.

Keep it burning !!

How to play

Made with controller in mind!
